title: Need clarification
body: Would I be able to get 520 rp (rp art) if I drew 52 pictures?

replies.body: Not quite lol. That program isn't a way to get free RP, it's just a fun little way to get that little bit of RP you need rather than having to buy more. For example, say you were wanting a 1350 RP skin, but you only had 1300 RP right now? It'd feel kinda bad to spend money just for 50 RP, so we could help bridge that gap.
ty lol u just saved me 2 hrs I want a {{champion:92}}  skin so bad lol
